div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Oct. 4, 1919. OUR SAVIOR'S LUTHERAN CHURCH

body.p: Our Savior's Lutheran Church celebrated its tenth anniversary last week at the Church, Berteau and Laramie Avenues. The festival lasted a whole week; following is the program for each day:
Sunday: Reverends Thor Sigmund and Lucas Engelstad, speakers.
Thursday: Festival for Homecoming Soldiers and Sailors.
Friday: Women's Societies Day; Reverend Lars Harrisville, speaker.
Sunday: Reverend Jens Nordby and Dr. G. H. Gerberding, speakers.
